(1) Reflex vasoconstriction and endothelial production of endothelin 1. (2) Release of vasoconstriction mediators; platelet derived growth factor (PDGF), serotonin (5-HT), thromboxane A2 (Tx-A2), platelet activating factor (PAF), adenosine diphosphate (ADP). (3) Vasoconstriction attributable to non-cellular components of embolus including thrombin.
